fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose someone during the day to ask them to add one song to the playlist.
- Add one song to the playlist during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Throughout the game, you will be creating a playlist of songs. At the end of the game, the host will rate all of the songs in the playlist out of 10.
- Each player you ask may choose whether or not they want to add a song to the playlist. If they do, you may choose to discard their song selection from the playlist after they choose it. They may add their song to the playlist at any time after you ask.
- You retain your abilities even when you're dead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Create a playlist that the host rates at least an average of 7/10.
